评论详情: I was Morticia Adams for Halloween and this necklace worked perfect for my costume. It’s pretty well made considering how cheap it is. Definitely give it five stars.
Only half the necklace came. Literally half the chain including the clasps is completely gone

评论概述: Love the look but chain quickly broke
评论详情: As the title says, I adore how this necklace looks, but unfortunately the chain is super cheap, and the links around the centerpiece are so loose or broken that it came apart after one wear, and is too small to easily slip back into place.

Its super cute but I had to add some extra jump rings to it because of how short the chain was. So keep that in mind if you have a wider nevk or you are plus sized. Super cute though, dont regret the purchase at all
